text.more:
The network contains the articles corresponding to keywords identified as trending in academic sources related to the Next Generation Internet, and the links between them.

The size of each node is proportional to its degree, i.e. to its overall number of connections within this network.

Each colour indicates a cluster of articles densely connected with each other.
text.intro: Network of hyperlinks between Wikipedia articles corresponding to trending keywords rlated to NGI.
text.title: Keywords network
